page.title: 13Local News Stories
page.content:
{Cartwright(5).}There was{Â£150}raised for the Village Hall Funds. (I.S.) _*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*
{Extension to Dunham Arms Pub. ----------------------------- Planning Officials said that to build an extension to the{Dunham Arms}was O.K. It had been worrying to the {Parish Council}that a 1,000 sq.ft. area might be made into a{Disco.}The pub's owners (Bank's Brewery) said it will not be a disco. It could make 10 or 15 more jobs for local people.(J.P) _*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*
Information from:_
{"The Chester Chronicle"
